#include <stdio.h>
#define MOD 1000000
unsigned long long power(unsigned long long x, unsigned long long y) {
if (y == 0)
return 1;
unsigned long long result = power(x, y >> 1);
result = (result * result) % MOD;
if (y & 1)
result = (result * x) % MOD;
return result;
}

int main()
{
long long int a, b;
while (1)
{
scanf("%lld%lld", &a, &b);
if (a == 0LL && b == 0LL)
return 0;
printf("%lld\n", power(a, b));
}
}
